trans-unit.source: Every blob in Azure storage must reside in a container.
trans-unit.target: Every blob in Azure storage must reside in a container.

trans-unit.source: The container forms part of the blob name.
trans-unit.target: The container forms part of the blob name.

trans-unit.source: For example, mycontainer is the name of the container in these sample blob URIs:
trans-unit.target: For example, mycontainer is the name of the container in these sample blob URIs:

trans-unit.source: Note that the name of a container must always be lowercase.
trans-unit.target: Note that the name of a container must always be lowercase.

trans-unit.source: If you include an upper-case letter in a container name, or otherwise violate the container naming rules, you may receive a 400 error (Bad Request).
trans-unit.target: If you include an upper-case letter in a container name, or otherwise violate the container naming rules, you may receive a 400 error (Bad Request).

trans-unit.source: For rules on naming containers, see <link><linkText>Naming and Referencing Containers, Blobs, and Metadata</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For rules on naming containers, see <link><linkText>Naming and Referencing Containers, Blobs, and Metadata</linkText><title></title></link>.
